mapper.select: select nvl(sum(decode(booking_status, 'confirmedIncome', booking_amount, 0)),0) confirmedIncome, nvl(sum(decode(booking_status, 'expectingIncome', booking_amount, 0)),0) expectingIncome, nvl(sum(decode(booking_status, 'canceledIncome', booking_amount, 0)),0) canceledIncome, nvl(sum(decode(booking_status, 'confirmedIncome', booking_total_cleaning_fee, 0)), 0) confirmedIncomeCleaningFee, nvl(sum(decode(booking_status, 'expectingIncome', booking_total_cleaning_fee, 0)), 0) expectingIncomeCleaningFee from (select decode(B.booking_status, 'BKG0101', 'expectingIncome', 'BKG0102', 'canceledIncome', 'BKG0103', 'expectingIncome', 'BKG0104', 'confirmedIncome') booking_status, booking_amount, booking_total_cleaning_fee from thxtay_booking B, thxtay_lodging L where B.lodging_no = L.lodging_no and L.user_no = #{userNo} and B.booking_status != 'BKG0102' and B.booking_check_out >= #{startDate} and B.booking_check_out < add_months(#{startDate},1) )

select Y.months, nvl(sum(decode(booking_status, 'confirmedInput', booking_amount, 0)),0) confirmedIncome, nvl(sum(decode(booking_status, 'expectingInput', booking_amount, 0)),0) expectingIncome from (select decode(B.booking_status, 'BKG0101', 'expectingInput', 'BKG0103', 'expectingInput', 'BKG0104', 'confirmedInput') booking_status, booking_amount, to_number(to_char(B.booking_check_out,'MM')) months from thxtay_booking B, thxtay_lodging L where B.lodging_no = L.lodging_no and L.user_no = #{userNo} and B.booking_status != 'BKG0102' and B.booking_check_out >= #{startDate} and B.booking_check_out < add_months(#{startDate},1)) X, (SELECT LEVEL MONTHS FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12) Y WHERE X.MONTHS(+) = Y.MONTHS GROUP BY Y.MONTHS ORDER BY Y.MONTHS
